title: Gazebo10 for Ubuntu 19.10 (Pop OS) "no release file found"

content.raw:
Hi, I just tried to install Gazebo 10 with the shell script from the website on my Pop OS 19.10 VM and it did run the script but when I try to start gazebo with "gazebo" in the terminal, it tells me it's not installed and I should get it with apt install. However, this only supports gazebo9. When I scrolled up the terminal output, I saw an error about not finding a release file for "eoan" (so the 19.10 version) and that this is not secure, so it wouldn't be installed or something. then it proceeded to get the dependencies of course and told me it's finished. I assume there is just not a release build for Ubuntu 19.10 in the repo yet? When is this going to be added because I would like to install Pop OS 19.10 on my new laptop in about 2 weeks.

Thanks for the help in advance!
content.html:
